data.name: The Steps as we know them Demo
data.detailed_description: The demo of this game shows a few easy puzzles that are not in the full game. It gives the player an idea of the mechanics used in the final game.
data.about_the_game: The demo of this game shows a few easy puzzles that are not in the full game. It gives the player an idea of the mechanics used in the final game.
data.short_description: The demo of this game shows a few easy puzzles that are not in the full game. It gives the player an idea of the mechanics used in the final game.

fullgame.name: The Steps as we know them

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.14+
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card, Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04+, SteamOS
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
